headline: FedEx Plans More Than 300 Layoffs At Texas Facility
summary: The logistics giant said impacted workers may be offered other positions with the company.

headline: FedEx (NYSE:FDX) Enhances Privacy Disclosures Collaboration With BBB National Programs
summary: FedEx (NYSE:FDX) recently partnered with BBB National Programs' Digital Advertising Accountability Program to refine its privacy practices across its digital platforms. This move aligns with industry standards and underscores the company's commitment to transparency. Over the past month, FedEx's share price advanced 2.67%, reflecting broader market trends, which have been buoyed by Nasdaq's gains. While such developments may have subtly contributed to FedEx's positive performance, the...

headline: UBS Lowers FedEx (FDX) Price Target, Keeps Buy Rating
summary: On Wednesday, May 28, UBS analyst Thomas Wadewitz lowered the price target on FedEx Corporation (NYSE:FDX) from $331 to $311 and maintained a “Buy” rating. Wadewitz noted that the business environment for FedEx Corporation (NYSE:FDX) in the fourth quarter of fiscal year 2025 looks more unstable and weaker than previously forecasted. This is especially true […]
